title: Medical experts recommend getting flu vaccine early, others prefer holistic approach
author: Charlee Rubesky; FOX
description: GREEN BAY (WLUK) -- Medical experts say this flu season will be unlike the others. "It will be difficult to tell if someone is ill from COVID or ill from influenza or could they potentially have both at the same time, so it will be very different to try and manage through this influenza season to be sure we're treating patients appropriately," Bellin Health infection prevention team leader Carol Bess said. When it comes to getting the flu shot, Bess says the sooner, the better.
